channel.title: LuzoxPK l Spawn l Pre-Made Banks l Eco l
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/n39g8h.png[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR="#0000CD"][CENTER][B][I]Why would you want to join?[/I][/B]
We are not a Server that is Online for the Donations. We are here to give you the best RSPS experience, and fun, thats all we care about. We listen to our community, we don't sell staff and such, you have to earn your way up. We also listen to every single Bug report, Suggestion and everything else that affects the playerbase.[/CENTER][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER][B][I]Challenge-Points[/I][/B]
Kill your fellow players with the challenge weapons Ex: Dragon dagger, do the final blow with that weapon and you will receive 1 challenge point.[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"][B][I]Mage-kill, Range-kill, Melee-kill Points[/I][/B]
Kill your fellow players with the Combat style weapon Ex: Dragon scimitar, Ancient staff, Rune crossbow, do the final blow with that weapon and you will receive 1 magic,range or melee kill point.[/CENTER][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FF00"][CENTER][B][I]Pking Aspect[/I][/B]
Kill other players with a amazing PK system, all special attacks work with correct animations for every weapon. Here at LuzoxPK we care about Pking, When logging in, you are given a choice whether to Train your account and recieve special perks OR set your combat levels to anything you desire with less perks. We have also made it so you can do a command and recieve a Starter-bank with, this includes hybrid gear, potions, Weapons and armour that suits all your needs. LuzoxPK also has Vengance & Dfs charge timers, which counts down until you can use it again! All magic spells are currently working and special formula's have been updated so nothing is OP but bad! LuzoxPK also has a Target System fully added! [/CENTER] [/COLOR] [COLOR="#EE82EE"][CENTER][B][I]Pvm[/I][/B]
We have added tons of bosses around Luzox, we have the new RS2007 bosses added into wilderness! Full GWD maps! Barrelchest & lots more! We have fully added a slayer system with a Unique slayer shop! [/CENTER][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#8B4513"][CENTER][B][I]Some Custom items[/I][/B]
We have added over 100 RS2007 custom items, ranging from the powerful ACB to the Beautiful Bronze (g) along side some Fancy Misc items for show! We also have the powerful PVP items added with some newer items! [/CENTER] [/COLOR] [CENTER][COLOR="#FFD700"][B][I]Some other Features that matter![/I][/B]
- Account pins - VPS Hosted - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Instant P'king - Challenge points - Magic-kill points - Range-kill points - Melee-kill points - Killstreaks - Daily spins - Daily Updates - Professional Owner and staff - Active Clean Forums - 474 Oldschool - Custom Items - Shops Not to many that floods the server teleport to ::shops - All godwars Dungeon bosses - All 20 skills working - All prayers working. - Slayer - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Edgeville Home - Many more features available ingame![/COLOR]
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291067/9f62fb2208b0ba62bbc50ef6fa566a2b.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/1af5961716fe765cd8ab2ca6dedf2336.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291071/846198d3ee1fc8f72eb78915d8f3f0f4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291072/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291073/dccd273bf8e373920d6f41ae9e38c75b.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291074/Screenshot_7.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291075/14f07df93b8cd3709d568303ddade081.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291076/10cb4c6d71f9f5d943512971b9aaed0c.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291077/d254a8657b8d8b7e9c7d8b817dbb824b.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4291079/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/faafc4889860554adc2bb574affa34bc.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/3b985fda5a2b22297481aab38fca7293.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/1f7825f9d4c8ddeb760b2ae8156fa593.png[/img] [B][I][SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"][COLOR="#FF0000"]We have alot more features ingame![/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B] [/SPOILER][/CENTER]
[B][I][CENTER][SIZE=7]Why not come check us out @ [url=http://www.LuzoxPK.net]LuzoxPk | Home[/url][/SIZE][/CENTER][/I][/B]

item.description:
@PvPKid0rg wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[COLOR="#0000CD"][CENTER][B][I]Why would you want to join?[/I][/B]

We are not a Server that is Online for the Donations. We are here to give you the best RSPS experience, and fun, thats all we care about. We listen to our community, we don’t sell staff and such, you have to earn your way up.
We also listen to every single Bug report, Suggestion and everything else that affects the playerbase.[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER][B][I]Challenge-Points[/I][/B]

Kill your fellow players with the challenge weapons Ex: Dragon dagger, do the final blow with that weapon and you will receive 1 challenge point.[/COLOR]

[COLOR="#FF8C00"][B][I]Mage-kill, Range-kill, Melee-kill Points[/I][/B]

Kill your fellow players with the Combat style weapon Ex: Dragon scimitar, Ancient staff, Rune crossbow, do the final blow with that weapon and you will receive 1 magic,range or melee kill point.[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#00FF00"][CENTER][B][I]Pking Aspect[/I][/B]

Kill other players with a amazing PK system, all special attacks work with correct animations for every weapon. Here at LuzoxPK we care about Pking, When logging in, you are given a choice whether to Train your account and recieve special perks OR set your combat levels to anything you desire with less perks. We have also made it so you can do a command and recieve a Starter-bank with, this includes hybrid gear, potions, Weapons and armour that suits all your needs. LuzoxPK also has Vengance & Dfs charge timers, which counts down until you can use it again! All magic spells are currently working and special formula’s have been updated so nothing is OP but bad! LuzoxPK also has a Target System fully added! [/CENTER]
[/COLOR]

We have added tons of bosses around Luzox, we have the new RS2007 bosses added into wilderness! Full GWD maps! Barrelchest & lots more! We have fully added a slayer system with a Unique slayer shop!
[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#8B4513"][CENTER][B][I]Some Custom items[/I][/B]

We have added over 100 RS2007 custom items, ranging from the powerful ACB to the Beautiful Bronze (g) along side some Fancy Misc items for show! We also have the powerful PVP items added with some newer items!
[/CENTER]
[/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR="#FFD700"][B][I]Some other Features that matter![/I][/B]
